original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, votes as v, users as u WHERE u.Id = c.UserId AND u.Id = v.UserId AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-08-10 17:55:45' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Reputation>=1 AND u.Reputation<=691
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.CreationDate >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-10 17:55:45'
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE CAST(users.Reputation AS INTEGER) >= 1 AND CAST(users.Reputation AS INTEGER) <= 691
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1.UserId=E3.Id)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1E3.UserId=E2.UserId)
